# Primal Hunter (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Dragon Magic (WotC), pg. 71

*Your muscles ripple with the memory of ancestral strength, tensing for quick action.*

This spell causes your body to recall the strength of your forebears, hearkening back to a time when your ancestors constantly struggled (or survival. You gain a +5 competence bonus on [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]], [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]], and [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks.

If *primal hunter* is active on you at the same time as *[[Primal Instinct (Spell)|primal instinct]]**,* *[[Primal Senses (Spell)|primal senses]]*, or *[[Primal Speed (Spell)|primal speed]]**, you* gain uncanny dodge (as the barbarian class feature). If all four of these spells are active on you at the same time, you gain improved uncanny dodge (as the barbarian class feature; your barbarian level for the purpose of being flanked equals your caster level).

*Special:* If you are of the dragonblood subtype, you can cast this spell as a swift action.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Elven archer 1 to Level \[New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.]
